cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.27)
project(Ghoul-Engine-Dependencies DESCRIPTION "A Basic Game Enine's Dependencies" LANGUAGES CXX HOMEPAGE_URL "https://github.com/ShoweryCellar34/Ghoul-Engine")
set(sdl3_opengl3 ON CACHE BOOL "sdl3_opengl3")
get_filename_component(sdl3_include_path "SDL/include/SDL3/" ABSOLUTE)
string(APPEND sdl3_include_path "/")
set(sdl3_path ${sdl3_include_path} CACHE STRING "sdl3_path")
set(SDL_STATIC ON CACHE BOOL "Build a static version of the library")
set(SDL_STATIC_PIC ON CACHE BOOL "Static version of the library should be built with Position Independent Code")
add_subdirectory(imgui)
add_subdirectory(SDL)
add_subdirectory(glm)
include_directories(glm)
